list_title_upcoming_schedule.description: Title for lists containing upcoming episodes. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

tag_text_season_premiere.description: Text for the tag that indicates the premiere of a season of a show. This should be as short as possible.

tag_text_series_premiere.description: Text for the tag that indicates the premiere of a series. This should be as short as possible.

tag_text_mid_season_premiere.description: Text for the tag that indicates the premiere of a mid-season of a show. This should be as short as possible.

tag_text_season_finale.description: Text for the tag that indicates the finale of a season of a show. This should be as short as possible.

tag_text_series_finale.description: Text for the tag that indicates the finale of a series. This should be as short as possible.

tag_text_mid_season_finale.description: Text for the tag that indicates the finale of a mid-season of a show. This should be as short as possible.

list_title_up_next.description: Title for lists containing the next episodes to watch of aired episodes. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

tag_text_remaining_episodes.description: Text for the tag that shows the number of remaining episodes in a show. This should be as short as possible.

list_title_recommended_movies.description: Title for lists containing recommended movies. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

tag_text_number_of_episodes.description: Text for the tag that shows the number of episodes in a show. This should be as short as possible.

error_404_message.default: (Don't worry, it happens! Even the Force is sometimes out of alignment.)

mark_as_watched_ask_prompt.default: When did you finish watching this? (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM)

button_text_watchlist.description: Text for the button that allows users to add/remove a movie or show to/from their watchlist.

button_text_mark_as_watched.description: Text for the button that allows users to mark a movie, episode, or show as watched.

button_text_watched_until_here.description: Text for the button that allows users to mark a show as watched until a specific point.

button_text_watch_again.description: Text for the button that allows users to mark a movie, episode, or show as re-watched.

button_label_add_to_watchlist.description: Aria-label for the button that adds a movie or show to the user's watchlist.

button_label_mark_as_watched.description: Aria-label for the button that marks a movie, episode, show as watched.

button_label_watched_until_here.description: Aria-label for the button that marks a show as watched until a specific point.

button_label_remove_from_watchlist.description: Aria-label for the button that removes a movie or show from the user's watchlist.

button_text_join_trakt.description: Text for the button that takes users to the Trakt login page.

button_label_join_trakt.default: Join trakt.tv to keep track of what you're watching
button_label_join_trakt.description: Aria-label for the button that takes users to the Trakt login page.

button_text_join_trakt_for_free.description: Text for the button that takes users to the Trakt login page.

landing_discover_description.default: what's hot and where to stream it.

landing_track_description.default: all the shows and movies you have ever watched.

list_title_trending.description: Title for lists containing trending movies or shows. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

list_title_recommendations.description: Title for lists containing recommended movies or shows. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

list_title_most_anticipated.description: Title for lists containing most anticipated movies or shows. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

button_text_get_vip.description: Text for the button that takes users to the VIP subscription page.

link_text_get_vip.description: Text for the link that takes users to the VIP subscription page.

button_label_get_vip.description: Aria-label for the button that takes users to the VIP subscription page.

link_label_get_vip.description: Aria-label for the link that takes users to the VIP subscription page.

button_label_user_profile.description: Aria-label for the button that opens the user profile page.

list_title_most_popular.description: Title for lists containing most popular movies or shows. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

button_text_browse_movies.description: Text for the button that allows users to browse movies.

button_label_browse_movies.description: Aria-label for the button that allows users to browse movies.

button_text_browse_shows.description: Text for the button that allows users to browse shows.

button_label_browse_shows.description: Aria-label for the button that allows users to browse shows.

button_text_home.description: Text for the button that takes users back to the homepage.

button_label_home.description: Aria-label for the button that takes users back to the homepage.

tag_text_plays.description: Text for the tag that shows the number of plays of a movie or episode. This should be as short as possible.

list_title_coming_soon.description: Title for lists containing watchlisted movies that are coming soon. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

tag_text_tba.description: Text for the tag that indicates that something has no release date yet. This should be as short as possible.

list_title_related_movies.description: Title for lists containing related movies. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

list_title_related_shows.description: Title for lists containing related shows. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

about_placeholder_1.default: This user is a mystery, shrouded in enigma... (or maybe just lazy? Who knows, this is the internet.)

about_placeholder_2.default: Apparently, this user is too busy watching movies to write about themselves. (Fair enough, I can relate.)

about_placeholder_3.default: This user's profile is a blank canvas, a void of information... (much like my social life. sigh)

about_placeholder_4.default: Unravel the secrets of this user's identity... (if you dare)

about_placeholder_5.default: What hidden depths lie beneath this empty profile? (The truth is out there...)

about_placeholder_6.default: This user is a ghost in the machine, a digital phantom... (or maybe they just forgot to fill this out?)

about_placeholder_7.default: Help this user out! Tell them to complete their profile. (They might even reward you with a virtual high five!)

about_placeholder_8.default: This profile is begging for attention. Give it some love and tell the user to fill it out.

about_placeholder_9.default: Don't be shy! Encourage this user to share their story. (Everyone has a story to tell, even if it's just about their favorite TV show.)

about_placeholder_10.default: This user is like a character in a David Lynch film: enigmatic, mysterious, and possibly a figment of their own imagination.

about_placeholder_11.default: This profile is as empty as a Blockbuster video store on a Friday night. (Remember those? Good times.)

about_placeholder_12.default: This user is channeling their inner Tyler Durden: rejecting consumerism and embracing the void. (Or maybe they just haven't gotten around to filling this out yet.)

about_placeholder_13.default: A stylized image: A funny illustration of a detective scratching their head in confusion, or a tumbleweed rolling across an empty profile page.

about_placeholder_14.default: An interactive element: A button that allows users to send a friendly nudge to the profile owner, encouraging them to complete their profile.

about_placeholder_15.default: A personalized message: If you have any information about the user (e.g., their watch history), you could use it to generate a more personalized placeholder, like 'This user loves horror movies but hates writing bios. (Maybe they're too busy hiding from zombies?)'

list_placeholder_watchlist_movies.default: Your watchlist is empty. Add movies to create your cinematic masterpiece.
list_placeholder_watchlist_movies.description: Placeholder text shown when there are no movies in the user's watchlist.

list_placeholder_watchlist_shows.default: Your watchlist is empty. Add shows to fuel your imagination.
list_placeholder_watchlist_shows.description: Placeholder text shown when there are no shows in the user's watchlist.

list_placeholder_upcoming_schedule.default: Explore TV series and personalize your schedule.
list_placeholder_upcoming_schedule.description: Placeholder text shown when there are no upcoming episodes in the schedule.

up_next_empty.default: Start watching and add shows to your watchlist.

list_placeholder_released_movies.default: Add movies to your watchlist and never miss a premiere.
list_placeholder_released_movies.description: Placeholder text shown when there are no released movies in the user's watchlist.

list_placeholder_unreleased_movies.default: Add upcoming movies to your watchlist and stay updated.
list_placeholder_unreleased_movies.description: Placeholder text shown when there are no unreleased movies in the user's watchlist.

button_text_find_movies.description: Text for the button that allows users to find movies. This button is shown in some empty lists.

button_text_find_shows.description: Text for the button that allows users to find shows. This button is shown in some empty lists.

tag_text_active_watchers.description: Text for the tag that shows the number of active watchers of a movie or show. This should be as short as possible.

list_title_show_credits.description: Title for lists containing shows related to a person's credits. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

list_title_movie_credits.description: Title for lists containing movies related to a person's credits. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

button_text_more.description: Text for the button that shows more items for a section in the interface.

button_text_browse_lists.description: Text for the button that allows users to browse their (watch) lists.

button_label_browse_lists.description: Aria-label for the button that allows users to browse their (watch) lists.

list_title_watchlist_shows.description: Title for lists containing shows in the user's watchlist. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

list_title_watchlist_movies.description: Title for lists containing movies in the user's watchlist. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

button_label_stream_on.description: Aria-label for the button that allows users to stream a movie or show on an external service.

button_text_remove_from_history.description: Text for the button that allows users to remove a movie or episode from their watch history.

button_label_remove_from_watched.description: Aria-label for the button that allows users to remove a movie, show, or episode from their watch history.

warning_prompt_remove_from_watched.default: Are you sure you want to remove {title} from your Watched list? All plays will be removed.
warning_prompt_remove_from_watched.description: Warning prompt shown when a user tries to remove a movie, show, or episode from their watch history.

button_label_remove_from_history.default: Remove this play of {title} from your Watched list

warning_prompt_remove_single_watched.description: Warning prompt shown when a user tries to remove a single play of a movie or episode from their watch history.

list_title_seasons.description: Title for lists containing seasons of a show. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

list_title_actors.description: Title for lists containing actors of a movie, show, or episode. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

tag_text_anticipated_count.description: Text for the tag that shows the number of users who are eagerly anticipating a movie or show. This should be as short as possible.

list_title_trending_shows.description: Title for lists containing trending shows. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

list_title_trending_movies.description: Title for lists containing trending movies. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

button_text_view_all.description: Text for the button that allows users to drill down on lists to view all items in it.

tag_text_full_season.description: Text for the tag that indicates the entry is a placeholder for the entire season. This should be as short as possible.

warning_prompt_remove_from_watchlist.default: Are you sure you want to remove {title} from your Watchlist?
warning_prompt_remove_from_watchlist.description: Warning prompt shown when a user tries to remove a movie or show from their watchlist.

list_title_anticipated_movies.description: Title for lists containing anticipated movies. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

list_title_anticipated_shows.description: Title for lists containing anticipated shows. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

list_title_popular_movies.description: Title for lists containing popular movies. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

button_text_stream_on.description: Text for the button that allows users to stream a movie or show on an external service.

list_title_your_watchlist_shows.description: Title for lists containing shows in the user's watchlist. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

share_movie.default: Just discovered {title} - you need to see this! 🎬

list_title_available_now.description: Title for lists containing watchlisted movies that are currently available to watch. This title should be as short and concise as possible.

tag_text_preview.description: Text for the tag that indicates a preview feature. This should be as short as possible.

preview_description.default: This feature's still getting a fresh coat of paint, citizen. We're hammering away at the UX, making it sing like a choir of angels (or at least, function smoothly without inducing existential dread).

warning_prompt_drop_show.default: Are you sure you want to drop {title} show? This will remove it from your up next list.
warning_prompt_drop_show.description: Warning prompt shown when a user tries to drop a show.

button_label_drop_show.description: Aria-label for the button that allows a user to drop a show. Indicating that a user is no longer actively tracking this show.

button_text_drop_show.description: Text for the button that allows a user to drop a show. Indicating that a user is no longer actively tracking this show.

enable_up_next_nitro_label.default: Enable Up Next Nitro, the fastest way to watch your shows

lab_up_next_nitro_message.default: This experiment is a performance upgrade which improves experience for all users.

lab_up_next_nitro_hidden_message.default: Due to internal design changes previously hidden shows will now be visible in your list with a black and white thumbnail to help you spot them quickly, with the option to either un-hide them or drop them from the list.

warning_prompt_restore_show.default: Are you sure you want to restore {title} show? This will restore it on your progress and calendar.
warning_prompt_restore_show.description: Warning prompt shown when a user tries to restore a hidden show.

button_label_restore_show.description: Aria-label for the button that restores a hidden show.

mark_as_watched_show_warning.default: Are you sure you want to mark {title} as watched? This will mark all episodes as watched.

mark_as_watched_show_until_warning.default: Are you sure you want to mark all unseen episodes of {title} as watched until episode {episode}? This will mark {count} episodes as watched.

mark_as_watched_multiple_episodes_warnin.default: Are you sure you want to mark {count} episodes as watched?

cookie_notice.default: Trakt uses C🍪🍪KIES in order to enhance your overall experience. You can read more information here.
